definition: banner/flag/(in Qing times) Manchu (cf. 八旗[Ba1 qi2])/administrative subdivision in inner Mongolia equivalent to 縣|县[xian4] county/CL:面[mian4]

square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter
the Stars and Stripes (US flag)/by extension, the United States of America/abbr. for Citibank 花旗銀行|花旗银行
Red flag city district/Hongqi district of Xinxiang city 新鄉市|新乡市[Xin1 xiang1 shi4], Henan
Red flag city district/Hongqi district of Xinxiang city 新鄉市|新乡市[Xin1 xiang1 shi4], Henan
military banner/flag signal/(fig.) banner (i.e. false pretenses)
to raise a flag/to hoist a flag
to show one's colors/to have a clear-cut stand (idiom)

sentences.english: To find out, hold a pencil up in front of you and block out the flaps.
sentences.chinese: 要尋找答案，拿根鉛筆在面前屏蔽掉這些旗。

sentences.english: Today even Tibetan monks in Chinese areas carry Tibetan flags.
sentences.chinese: 現在，甚至到漢區的藏僧，都帶著雪山獅子旗。

sentences.english: The hammer and sickle was flying over the roof.
sentences.chinese: 鐮刀斧頭旗在屋頂上下空飄揚。

sentences.english: The optimized irrigation decreases the angle between flag leaf and stem.
sentences.chinese: 優化灌溉處理小麥旗葉莖葉夾角明顯減小。

sentences.english: Phil Hill takes the checkered flag, setting a new race speed record.
sentences.chinese: 菲爾山取格子旗，創下了新的比賽速度的紀錄。

sentences.english: The cat learned the physical skills quickly and the tiger was always behind.
sentences.chinese: 貓學習動作技巧涸旗，老虎卻總是落後。

sentences.english: The sailor dipped the ship's flag as a salute.
sentences.chinese: 水手將船上的旗升上去再降下來以示致敬。

sentences.english: In other words, if a man loves his country, he must love the national flag.
sentences.chinese: 換句話說，假如一小我私紀猱國，他必需愛國旗。

sentences.english: Aim To study the effect of 5F on tubulin polymerization.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究半邊旗提取物5F對微管蛋白聚合的影響。

sentences.english: The patrol car was passing the crossing beside the She-Tzuo-Liao flag station.
sentences.chinese: 巡道車正要通過施厝寮旗站旁的平交道。

sentences.english: The tide riders surf the currents; the flags they hold up never get wet.
sentences.chinese: 弄潮兒向濤頭立，手把紅旗旗不溼。

sentences.english: When fascism comes to America, it will come wrapped in an America flag.
sentences.chinese: ‘法西斯主義登陸美國時，總會包着一面美國旗。’

sentences.english: Can you explain why the flags help or hinder good composition?
sentences.chinese: 你能解釋爲什麼這些旗幫助或者損害了好的構圖嗎？

sentences.english: The ship was flying the British flag .
Adopted in 1990 when the north and south of Yemen unified.
sentences.chinese: 北葉門和南葉門於一九九零年統一時採用這面旗。

sentences.english: Several ministers had arrived to perform ceremonies and rainbow flags were being waved.
sentences.chinese: 幾個神父到場主持儀式，彩虹旗四處飄揚。

definition: Red flag city district/Hongqi district of Xinxiang city 新鄉市|新乡市[Xin1 xiang1 shi4], Henan
the hammer and sickle (flag of USSR, symbolizing rural and proletarian labor)
oath/pledge/union/to ally/league, a subdivision corresponding to prefecture in Inner Mongolia
(in former times) upper, middle and lower army/army of right, center and left/(in modern times) the three armed services: Army, Navy and Air Force
Wulan county in Haixi Mongol and Tibetan autonomous prefecture 海西蒙古族藏族自治州[Hai3 xi1 Meng3 gu3 zu2 Zang4 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Qinghai
